internalConnections.notes: Current flows from ANODE to CATHODE only (diode behavior). Requires forward voltage ~2V and current-limiting resistor.

pins.label: Anode (+)
pins.description: Positive terminal. Connect to power through a current-limiting resistor. Longer leg on physical LED.

pins.label: Cathode (-)
pins.description: Negative terminal. Connect to ground. Shorter leg on physical LED, flat side of LED case.
